summary:
With this mod, Lydia will no longer die and should be able to hold an infinite amount of items.
I\'m taking requests to do this to other followers. This is the first mod I made, and since it\'s gotten a good amount of subscribers on the Steam Workshop, I decided to upload it here as well.
descriptionHtml:
With this mod, Lydia will no longer die and should be able to hold an infinite amount of items.
I\'m taking requests to do this to other followers.

This is the first mod I made, and since it\'s gotten a good amount of subscribers on the Steam Workshop, I decided to upload it here as well.
author: TheGreenMage12201
